title: Bin Brite Spring Blossom, Spray, Eliminates Odours
features: FRESH & CLEAN BINS: The new Bin Brite Bin Odour Neutraliser Spray, perfect solution to your smelly bins! Use in both indoor and outdoor bins. Simply spray directly onto rubbish to deodorise and fragrance your bin.

FRAGRANCE BURST FOR BINS: Bin Brite Bin Odour Neutraliser Spray, add a Citronella & Lemongrass burst of fragrance to indoor household bins and outside wheelie bins, keeping them fresher for longer. Suitable for most bins and bin bags

CLEANS BINS, ELIMINATES ODOURS: The new Bin Brite Bin Odour Neutraliser Spray, suitable to clean bins, simply spray onto all the bin surfaces, leave for 20 seconds, wipe off with a damp cloth or paper towel. Bin Brite smells great, leaving the bin fresh and clean with a lasting fragrance
description: Product Description The new Bin Brite Bin Odour Neutraliser Spray, perfect solution to your smelly bins! Use in both indoor and outdoor bins. Simply spray directly onto rubbish to deodorise and fragrance your bin. Bin Brite Bin Odour Neutraliser Spray, add a Spring Blossom burst of fragrance to indoor household bins and outside wheelie bins, keeping them fresher for longer. Suitable for most bins and bin bags. The new Bin Brite Bin Odour Neutraliser Spray, suitable to clean bins, simply spray onto all the bin surfaces, leave for 20 seconds, wipe off with a damp cloth or paper towel. Bin Brite smells great, leaving the bin fresh and clean with a lasting fragrance. Search Amazon.co.uk for other Bin Brite products. Bin Brite Spring Blossom, 400ml Trigger Spray Ingredients <5% Non Ionic Surfactants, Preservatives, Parfum, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Cinnamate, Cyclamen Aldehyde. Safety Warning sytay away from eye contact See more
